channel.title: Dashboard on Danielle Gatland
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboard on Danielle Gatland

item.title: Project Management Dashboard
item.description: MRCagney Reports, an internal project management web app, began as a personal project of mine to improve on other project management platforms I had seen and/or trialled. After developing an initial prototype for drilling into timesheet data to support project management, I shared my concept with my colleagues at MRCagney. Following some refinement and collaboration, one of my colleagues and I developed the tool further, ultimately creating a key tool for all project managers at MRCagney.

item.title: NZ Arrivals (and the Impacts of COVID-19)
item.description: This was a personal interest project I created during one of Auckland’s COVID-19 lockdowns. As New Zealand’s borders went through various levels of restrictions on international travel to New Zealand, I was curious to see how the international arrivals compared to previous years. Rather than simply creating some charts at the time, I thought the the trend of international arrivals as the world ‘returned to normal’ would be interesting, and therefore an interactive and updatable dashboard would be the best solution.
